generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide asphalt road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: On the right side of the image, there is a paved area next to the road with pedestrians, which is a sidewalk.
- building: The image shows large multi-story structures on both sides of the road, which are buildings.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees visible along the sides of the road and in the background, which are vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a bright, overcast sky without visible leaves or obstructions.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are parked on the left side of the road and a few are visible driving in the distance.
- truck: A large truck is visible in the distance, driving away from the camera.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a blue parking sign and other regulatory signs, mounted on poles.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
